name: Legion Rush
description:
Legion Rush

Made in a week for the 2021.1 Brackeys Game Jam. (Theme was Stronger Together)

You control a Roman legion that has been tasked to destroy three different barbarian villages. But in order to do so you must rally civilians to your side so you are strong enough to destroy them whilst avoiding hazardous traps on the way there.

Controls

A and D - Move left to right.
Spacebar - Split your legionaries into two separate groups.
W - Attack to destroy breakable obstacles and kill barbarians before they kill you.
P - Pause the game.

Credits
